title: Bus against Brexit starts UK tour
text:
Bus against Brexit starts UK tour 5:03pm GMT - 00:48 
A campaign bus against Brexit starts its eight-day tour of the UK, emblazoned with the claim that leaving the EU will cost £2 billion ($2.78 billion) a week. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A campaign bus against Brexit starts its eight-day tour of the UK, emblazoned with the claim that leaving the EU will cost £2 billion ($2.78 billion) a week. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
